title: CYBERWISE â€“ 2-Day Workshop on Cybersecurity for Information Security Expertise
description: The CYBERWISE Workshop aims to create awareness and provide hands-on exposure to students, faculty, and staff on various aspects of cybersecurity, cybercrimes, and preventive measures. The two-day event will feature expert talks, interactive discussions, and practical sessions, offering participants the opportunity to experience real-world cybersecurity practices and defense mechanisms.
